name: Plundermonium
description:
Sail the high seas in search of golden booty in this 8bit, procedurally generated pirate adventure!

Use various abilities to fend of those pesky rival pirates defending their loot. Stop in the shallows of each island to plunder all its gold and take it back to your home base to repair and upgrade your vessel! Be aware though, your ship will sink if you take too much damage or you don't make it back in the sixty seconds.

Controls:

W/S - Increase/decrease the ships speed. Dependent on the number of sail upgrades you have

A/D - Rotate the ship

Left/Right Arrows - Shoot port and starboard cannons

UpArrow - Use the 'Ramming Speed' ability (if unlocked)

DownArrow - Use the 'Explosive Barrel' ability (if unlocked)

Q - Zoom in

E - Zoom out
